column3: Finalize governance canvas and get approvals
Set up project tracking (meetings, tools, comms)
Confirm data access and quality requirements
Brief pilot users on objectives and timeline
Begin with HITL oversight for all transactions
Document all edge cases and exceptions
Log all human overrides with reasons
Weekly model/process adjustments based on feedback
Update training materials based on learnings
Pilot evaluation checkpoint: Metrics meet targets
Onboard next wave of users (if pilot successful)
Transition oversight model if appropriate (HITL to HOTL)
Set up automated alerting for anomalies
Transition support from project team to operations
Create success story for internal communication
